name: Circuit wise Static IP
query:
SELECT
    -- From Site
    site.name AS "Circuit ID:Link/Site:150",
    site.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    site.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:200",
    site.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:150",

    -- From Lastmile Services Master (join via circuit_id)
    lms.name AS "LMS ID:Link/Lastmile Services Master:180",
    lms.lms_feasibility_partner AS "Supplier (Partner):Link/LMS Feasibility Partner:200",
    lms.supplier AS "Supplier:Link/Supplier:180",
    lms.static_ip_1 AS "Static IP:Data:180"

FROM
    `tabSite` site

LEFT JOIN `tabLastmile Services Master` lms
    ON TRIM(lms.circuit_id) = TRIM(site.name)

ORDER BY
    site.name ASC;
